Room.Name: Holy Order of the Red Rose
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a holy shrine for paladins. Please bow your head.
Room.LongDescription: The paladin represents living truth and goodness, and dedicates his person to the elimination of evil in the world. However, at each step in his advancement, he must be tested to see that he has remained pure of heart, thought and deed. To that end, high level paladins often come here and voulnteer to serve as mentors for newly advancing members of their holy order. Do not enter the training areas if you are not ready.
